PHY configuration structure. More...

#include <csl_emif.h>

Detailed Description

PHY configuration structure.

This structure provides configuration settings for PHY support. A pointer to this structure is specified in the CSL_EmifConfig structure. If default settings are desired, a NULL pointer can be specified in which case the indicated default values will be used.

Field Documentation

bool CSL_EmifPhyParms::bCA

[IN] Run PHY LPDDR3 CA training (default: false)

bool CSL_EmifPhyParms::bDCAL

[IN] Run Digital Delay Line (DDL) Calibration (default: true)

bool CSL_EmifPhyParms::bDramReset

[IN] Issues a reset to the DRAM (by driving the DRAM reset pin low) and wait 200us (DDR4 and DDR3 only) (default: false)

bool CSL_EmifPhyParms::bPhyReset

[IN] Resets the AC and DATX8 modules by asserting the AC/DATX8 reset pin (default: false)

bool CSL_EmifPhyParms::bPllBypass

[IN] If true, PUB/PHY are put into PLL bypass mode (default: false)

bool CSL_EmifPhyParms::bPLLInit

[IN] Run PLL initialization sequence which includes correct driving of PLL power-down, reset and gear shift pins, and then waiting for the PHY PLLs to lock (default: true)

bool CSL_EmifPhyParms::bZCAL

[IN] Run Impedence calibration (default: true)
